name: Colors (megowhat)
description:
Made for the Lost Relic Games “Game Jam.”

For some odd reason most of the walls were drained of paint which is needed to illuminate the rooms. The Dispensing Stations requires a connection to the appropriate Filling Stations in order to give light to each floor. Unfortunately this can’t be done without some help. It is your job as a paint tube to collect the correct color from a Filling Station and deposit it into the Dispensing Station in order to form somewhat of a connection between the two.

There are a total of 5 floors ranging from way to easy to “UGH...” This is the first time I’ve joined a game jam and I’m pretty much a novice. Trying to make this on my own while having two full time jobs is rather challenging, but I managed it some how.  I hope you enjoy it!

Edit: I fixed a collision bug while there was 2 days left in the jam.
